data.comment: The big names in today's match at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao have now been confirmed.
The match is underway in Vila Nova de Famalicao.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Sporting.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Famalicao in their own half.
Free kick for Sporting in the half of Famalicao.
Throw-in Famalicao.
Can Sporting get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Famalicao's half?
Famalicao awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Vila Nova de Famalicao a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Famalicao take a 1-0 lead thanks to Uros Racic.
Famalicao awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Sporting in their own half.
Free kick Famalicao.
Goal! Famalicao extend their lead to 2-0 through Diogo Goncalves.
Great play from Fabio Martins to set up the goal.
Ball safe as Sporting is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Famalicao are pushing forward but Diogo Goncalves's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Sporting goal kick.
Free kick Sporting.
Throw-in for Famalicao in their own half.
Throw-in for Famalicao in the half of Sporting.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Sporting in their own half.
In Vila Nova de Famalicao Famalicao attack through Walterson. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Sporting at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao.
Free kick for Sporting in their own half.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho awards Famalicao a goal kick.
Sporting push forward at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao and Luciano Vietto gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Famalicao defence.
Sporting are coming forward and Andraz Sporar gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Famalicao have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Famalicao at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho awards the home team a throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Vila Nova de Famalicao.
Throw-in for Famalicao at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao.
Famalicao's Diogo Goncalves misses with an attempt on goal.
Sporting have a goal kick.
Luciano Vietto of Sporting is pulled up for offside.
Famalicao's Toni Martinez has run offside.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a Sporting throw-in in Famalicao's half.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a throw-in for Sporting, close to Famalicao's area.
Ball safe as Sporting is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Famalicao in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Sporting have a dangerous throw-in.
Sporting to take a throw-in in Famalicao territory.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Sporting.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Vila Nova de Famalicao.
In Vila Nova de Famalicao a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Luciano Vietto for Sporting gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Famalicao goal kick.
Famalicao awarded a free kick in their own half.
Famalicao awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Sporting at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Sporting in their own half.
Sporting to take a throw-in in Famalicao territory.
Corner awarded to Sporting.
Free kick for Famalicao in their own half.
Can Famalicao get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sporting's half?
Throw-in for Sporting in the half of Famalicao.
Sporting's Jovane Cabral gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Famalicao defender.
Free kick for Sporting in the half of Famalicao.
Sporting are in shooting range from this free kick.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Famalicao's Fabio Martins has been booked in Vila Nova de Famalicao and will miss the next match through suspension.
Sebastian Coates (Sporting) strikes with a header to reduce the deficit to 2-1 at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao.
That's a fine assist from Marcos Acuna.
The second-half has started.
Throw-in Sporting.
Free kick for Famalicao in the half of Sporting.
Luis Neto (Sporting) gets a yellow card. He will be suspended from the next match!
Diogo Goncalves (Famalicao) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Sporting in their own half.
Sporting awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Vila Nova de Famalicao to check on Fabio Martins, who is grimacing with pain.
Sporting have been awarded a corner by Luis Miguel Branco Godinho.
Jovane Cabral of Sporting gets in a strike, but is off target.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho awards Famalicao a goal kick.
Fabio Martins has recovered and rejoins the match in Vila Nova de Famalicao.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Famalicao.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a Famalicao throw-in in Sporting's half.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho awards the away team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Famalicao awarded a free kick in their own half.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho awards Sporting a goal kick.
Sporting awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Walterson (Famalicao) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Sporting have been awarded a corner by Luis Miguel Branco Godinho.
Luciano Vietto of Sporting gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Vila Nova de Famalicao.
Goal kick for Sporting at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao.
Sporting to take a throw-in in Famalicao territory.
Can Sporting get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Famalicao's half?
Free kick Famalicao.
Free kick for Sporting in their own half.
Free kick for Famalicao in their own half.
Walterson (Famalicao) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in for Sporting in the half of Famalicao.
Throw-in for Sporting close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Famalicao in their own half.
Goal! Diogo Goncalves extends Famalicao's lead to 3-1.
Pedro Goncalves instrumental with a fine assist.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Sporting's Andraz Sporar attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Famalicao have a goal kick.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a Famalicao throw-in in Sporting's half.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Sporting in their own half.
In Vila Nova de Famalicao a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Sporting just outside Famalicao's area.
Riccieli (Famalicao) has been given a yellow card and will be suspended from the next match.
Can Sporting get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Famalicao's half?
Famalicao awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Sporting in their own half.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Famalicao in their own half.
Chico Geraldes is on a sub for Eduardo Henrique for Sporting.
Corner awarded to Sporting.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho awards the home team a throw-in.
Joao Pedro Sousa (Famalicao) is making a first substitution, with Guga replacing Fabio Martins.
Famalicao awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Sporting is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Rafael Camacho is replacing Valentin Rosier for Sporting at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao.
Free kick for Sporting in their own half.
Famalicao awarded a free kick in their own half.
The home team replace Toni Martinez with Anderson Silva.
Corner awarded to Sporting.
Sporting have been awarded a corner by Luis Miguel Branco Godinho.
Pedro Mendes is replacing Gonzalo Plata for the away team.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Sporting in their own half.
Free kick for Famalicao in their own half.
The match at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao has been interrupted briefly for a check on Jovane Cabral, who is down injured.
Free kick in a good position for Famalicao!
Sportingâ€™s Jovane Cabral is on his feet again at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao.
Famalicao make their third substitution with Alex Centelles replacing Walterson.
Marcos Acuna for Sporting has been booked by Luis Miguel Branco Godinho and receives a first yellow card.
Anderson Silva is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Famalicao are coming forward and Alex Centelles gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Sporting goal kick.
Anderson Silva for Famalicao is back on the field again.
Anderson Silva of Famalicao smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Famalicao have been awarded a corner by Luis Miguel Branco Godinho.
Can Famalicao capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sporting's half?
The 2nd half is prolonged by 5 minutes of added time.
Throw-in Famalicao.
Throw-in high up the field for Famalicao in Vila Nova de Famalicao.
Throw-in for Sporting at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao.
Sporting's Pedro Mendes looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Pedro Mendes (Sporting) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Famalicao defenders.
Throw-in for Famalicao in the half of Sporting.
Free kick for Famalicao in the half of Sporting.
The match has come to a close in Vila Nova de Famalicao. The final score is 3-1.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho waits before resuming play because Pedro Mendes for Sporting is still down.
Rodrigo Battaglia is booked for the away team.
